titleText: Xbox One S drops to its lowest ever price for Black Friday
mainText: Microsoft is unveiling its Black Friday discounts today, and there’s a number of deals if you’re interested in an Xbox, Windows laptop, or a Windows Mixed Reality headset. Microsoft is discounting the Xbox One S.

titleText: The Xbox One X Presents Microsoft With A Problem And An Opportunity
mainText: Technically-oriented reviews of games running on the are making it clear that the console lives up to the pre-launch hype. For the most part, games look and run better - sometimes a lot better -.

titleText: Microsoft is on a hiring spree at US business schools
mainText: Safiya Miller had her pick of job offers from big technology companies after earning an MBA from Cornell’s Johnson Graduate School of Management in New York state. In the end, she chose Microsoft, becoming an account.
